Name: Tropical Pineapple Daiquiri
Ingredients: 45 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of pineapple wedge & Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: Pineapple and rich almond flavours add a tropical touch to this refreshing Daiquiri.
History: Adapted from a recipe promoted by Giffard in June 2016 with the launch of their Caribbean Pineapple liqueur.
Nutrition: One serving of Tropical Pineapple Daiquiri contains 201 calories
